categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns

nodes.text: In the year 13 BBY, the Galactic Empire's military forces invaded the planet Tervissis. The invasion was preceded by Imperial raids against the planet five years earlier as part of the Listehol Campaign, in which the Imperials strove to drive out Tervig slavers, along with Zygerrian slavers and Sikurdian pirates, from the Listehol Run and Shaltin Tunnels hyperlanes.

The invasion was first mentioned in The Essential Guide to Warfare, an extensive guide dedicated to the conflicts in the galaxy, written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart and released in 2012. The result of the invasion was not specified in the book.
